underlying_goal: Convert a raw meeting transcript (Korean, about FBK OMS) into a structured, formatted meeting minutes markdown document
friction_detail: Claude initially did not receive the transcript content and had to ask the user to paste it again, despite the user saying 'the following transcript'.
brief_summary: User wanted a messy Korean meeting transcript about FBK OMS converted into a structured meeting minutes document, and Claude successfully generated it after receiving the transcript content.
